lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, our friends since the beginning of campaign two, and the ones who endure this gentleman every week, D&D Beyond, Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now, often Laura goes next in the announcements with merch stuff, but I always feel like there could be more stuff focusing on my characters, so I thought I'd use some of my time tonight to pitch a few merch ideas to Laura.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But maybe if you guys like them and she likes them, you can find these things in the Crit Role store later this year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a resealable plastic bag?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right there below your right hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, on the side of the-- yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Last but not least, for our adult Critters who want to spice things up in the bedroom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be sure to tweet your favorites at Laura Bailey and keep checking the store to see which ones made the cut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep, just keep on checking that store.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An optimal app for use in your D&D games, where you can keep your character information and dungeon mastering abilities very clean, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love how Matt always has to like actually--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the net proceeds are going to special AFK rooms, which are volunteer-run safe spaces for anyone who feels overwhelmed and needs a place to stay to regain their clam at upcoming PAX events, which is a great thing that I'm so glad conventions are now beginning to provide, 'cause man, can those places get real overwhelming real fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can head out to IdleChampions.com/CriticalRole for more details on this awesome endeavor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's bad-ass and it just gets more intense from here on out, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Laura, you have something to note as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes, you may have noticed on our store online this morning, oh, shit I knocked it over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! It's the same size as our other maps by Deven Rue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can check it out on our shop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Each one come with a cock ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in our US and our UK store.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to get that cube joke--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that's the end of our announcements, so let's go ahead and get us in to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had the lucky, prestigious honor of joining the future Super Bowl champion Dallas Cowboys at their training camp--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: So is it safe to assume your favorite team is the Cowboys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm from Dallas! I love the Cowboys! They're the best! They're the best!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This has been him all week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for, you know, I mean, Laura's a great wife, but I've never seen him this excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (growling) (water bubbling) (thunder rumbling) (explosion) ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ (dramatic music) ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call? ♪ ♪ Dig in deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn, your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing) (dragon roaring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You called in an additional favor with Shadowhand Essek, teleported northward to the Myth Burrow, which seems to be the den, or domain, depending how you want to pronounce it, of this entity, this white dragon known as Gelidon, the Nightmare in Ivory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. We were trying to remember exactly-- yeah, as you were saying.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: We just didn't know what the adjective was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is ridiculous, have fun," and turns around and starts walking away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to tell at this distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about his footprints? Is he leaving footprints in the snow?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, first roll of the night! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have my stuff, oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you see are two grooves dragging forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's hovering, but the snow is too--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't tell. The cloak goes just past that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably pretty cold at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm really glad we bought jackets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to maybe batten down somewhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything nearby, like a-- not a dragon cave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there any other clearings or caves? Is there anywhere that seems like it might give us shelter that isn't the big entrance of doom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check in the space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, at the storm at this distance, do it with disadvantage, just because your vision is somewhat obscured by the storm--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look, too, because I said it, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The teleportation spell was very accurate and brought you straight towards the base of Mythburrow per your request.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When we look up, can we see any caves in the mountainside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what they were looking for.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Can you see inside the giant mouth of the cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to get closer to look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the mess of weather, daylight breaking through at all, time of day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there's light out, but the sky itself is dark gray, heavy clouds, coming through storm, not quite blizzard, but it's still an intense storm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vegetation, trees, in the distance, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Several hundred yards to the base of the mountain or to the mouth of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are levels where it evens off and then climbs up further and then climbs up further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure if they're just old and have long been dead or if there's an actual cycle of weather and nature that occasionally the storms allow things to grow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a tree that exists in a cold space, unfortunately.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Should we peek into the cave and see if we see the dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what I was going to ask. I mean, before we bed down for the night, should we just at least establish that this is the correct cave?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: That wasn't my idea. My idea was if the dragon's far back in the cave, we can take a corner to ourselves and take a nap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he's not far back in the cave--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it's not the right cave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have things for this. We have a cat, don't we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is your cat a cat today, Mr. Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only ask him yes or no questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My birthday was two months ago, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for this gift, Liam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, not only do we need to carefully scout the cave, but also in case the dragon is in there and if we agitate it, how the fuck do we get out of here? We don't really have a quick means of escape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You also have the hut that we can be in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long does the hut last? 10 hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight hours, as long as he stays within it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know that you can be inside the dome and controlling the cat at the same time, isn't that correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good we're getting the positivity out now before we're all--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb doesn't feel like talking very much, I can tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's already going in to his trance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got a lot of text messages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So are you setting up the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, what does it look like? What does this landscape--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can go up against the rocks that I saw, the outcropping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about 250 feet or so from the entrance of this cavern, and around you is just snow and ice and dead trees and rock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't hear anything. We don't see any dragons around, there's no--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because if we catch its attention, we're going to be in some trouble right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, and then we'll be sitting there for eight hours hoping it goes away.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I don't think dragons just disappear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I may, we could create the dome, and by we I mean you, Mr. Caleb, and as soon as it's set up, I believe it can keep everything out, right? However, it will also keep snow out, so if we covered it with snow, like covered it up with snow, like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be really hard to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would be really hard to see is what I am saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can also make it look however he wants it to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he can make it look like snow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could make it look white and we could also just puff it up a little bit.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can make us a campfire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would be a bad thing, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The smoke would come out of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have any supernatural fire, maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well then, I don't think supernatural fire makes smoke, if I recall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even know what supernatural fire is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like Caleb's light balls that he has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to have to turn off my buzzer here because we're getting a shitton of Liam texts in the thread.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, knowing from past experience and text messages, the hut is actually warm inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can control the temperature outside, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say because it is magically created, the bonfire would not create smoke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so we make the dome, and then once we're all cozy inside, Frumpkin can go in and peek around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, or you can do it, because you can be invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can also, you know, send messages to the dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That seems like a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing, I mean, I can wait to say all this when we're in the hut, but here's the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to know we're there, so might as well talk to them and see if maybe they'll just breathe on it without fighting us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could be a nice dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay with that. However, maybe we should talk with them after we've rested and have all of our capabilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, maybe we should talk with them before, that way I don't waste my spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. Have any of you ever actually spoken or dealt with a dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We actually all did and kind of arrogant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, I repressed that memory, apparently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've been through a lot of shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot happens in a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all ever think about that? Like, are we really living in the moment? Are we processing--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can get the doll for a visual aid if you need.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Liam's somewhere in the wilderness like, "Let me in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It seemed very clever and dark, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You read a lot on the white dragon, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That doesn't mean that they're stupid by any means, but as far as the scales of the chromatics, they have-- the most intelligent of white dragons sometimes range the average intelligence of a person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aren't they also the most vengeful or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're intelligent, you know, like any intelligent creature is, but they're not the kind to outsmart one of wits, necessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe we could send in an animal with the metal strapped to it or something, and then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can also turn into an animal.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can also turn into an animal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't want you to be the one that we try to set on, not fire but ice--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: True, but I can make an animal that we can set on ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And tie the metal to it, and then the dragon will just be like, "Oh man, I'm so hungry!"

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Wait, but if it's hungry, what if it eats the bar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to agitate it. We need--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need a fast animal that just runs around.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: What if it's like a snow leopard?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then, if the dragon kills it, we still have the problem of a big dragon going and eating its body or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could attach the piece of metal to a rope, so if the snow cheetah dies--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay wait, what if we put the metal in the snow leopard's mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's about to get eaten, and then you send in your Mage Hand and you snatch up the ingot out of the dragon's mouth before it ever gets to eat it, and then you bring it back into the hut, and then we're all safe and then Caleb, you can do teleportation, then we're gone--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away do you need to be for your hand?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say that we do have a little talky button that we could attach to--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: And the snow leopard could send a message that says, "We're friends. Hi!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we now have a talking snow leopard?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Another thing to keep in mind, with all this drawing things out of the cave, look around our feet. Are we leaving prints in the snow, tracks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you're standing right now, yes, very much so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So if we go in and flee or throw something in and retract it, it will lead a straight line directly to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we have the hut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, and then we do the Teleportation Circle within the dome, and then we just bamf out from the dome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds like it could work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't know if that can, does that work?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Or I can send in a snow leopard, and then I turn into a giant spider, and then I send out a spider web, and then pull on the spider web, and then we run away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This might take a few rounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because they said it had to change color.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It has to glow blue, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we have two approaches that we can take here, which is we can either try and reason with this dragon and try and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we just try to trick it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we try and trick it, which may lead to killing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It sounds look a woman scorned on her wedding day, I don't know--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: So somebody has to marry it, problem solved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to marry a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have lots of rings on my fingers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But no, this is, I mean--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An important question for Caleb is can the dome be up and then can he also conjure, draw, whatever the transportation--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scratch your arm, scratch your arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't realize he was even gone for a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Cause, you know, dome is a concentration spell,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the dome is not concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it just lasts for eight hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I can do it, can we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Neither of them are concentration, but each take a minute to cast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're inside the dome then the dragon can't get in the dome, and then you can draw at your leisure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That also means that any contact we have with the dragon will be no Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I use Dimension Door and I do pop over, then would I be able to pop into the dome, or would I have to pop, just probably next to it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He decides who comes in and out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it considered on the same plane of existence?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should get closer and see what we'll be informed by--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems like, talking it through with these animals and the mage hands and everything, it seems like some of us are going to have to get close to do this.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: What if we go in and the dragon's like an old man and we can just slit its throat and leave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The older they get, the worse they get.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be called like the Nap in Ivory if it was that old--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Maybe he hasn't had his name updated. We don't know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, regarding killing, I don't think the dragon can breathe once it's dead, so that will have foiled our plans.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we should try to kill it because it's going to be very strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he was kind of a baby, and he was really hard to kill.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a really bad pitch. (laughs) What if we all go in together, because we're better as a team.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also you can bamf around with your Dimension Door a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll obviously have to see what the inside of this cave is like, but if we spread out a lot and sort of do like a hot potato thing with the mithral, right? That way, even if it blasts one of us, maybe we won't die, and then we can just hot potato it somewhere else, and then the dragon will shoot that person, and that person won't die either, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we can start with some of the illusion stuff, but eventually, if that this piece of hunk of metal gets stuck, someone's going to have to run and get it, and then I think the baton pass-off is actually not a bad call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, if though, one hit from his breath does kill us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was going to suggest that maybe Reani could go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we just get closer and we actually take a look, yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, will you send Frumpkin in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go around the side, set up the dome, and then send in Frumpkin, yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, can you cast the dome twice in one day? If we set it up now, will you also be able to set it up so we can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 3rd-level spell, so it can be cast multiple times a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (as Beau) Okay, well yeah, but we're going to sleep though, right? We're going to sleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody go ahead and roll stealth checks, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, which one am I going to use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus 10 with Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled this thing, but I don't know how to tell what number it landed on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that? Is that a UFO?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I should a roll different dice, just because I don't know what it actually says.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that was for Beau, for Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, we don't have Pass-- we do have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do have Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going towards the right or the left side of the cavern entrance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there one that has more of a flat area next to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the two of them, the side of the mountain tends to be pretty similar. There's some variations, but it doesn't seem to be a difference one way or the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no plateaus on either side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys curve to the left, make your way to the side, unnoticed, no other scenario, no issues.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we hear anything being closer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to sniff the air.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: As we get closer to the cave, can I see inside of it yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to head towards the front of the cave?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Yeah, let's stay as a group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need to cast that fucking dome.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Can we make our campsite now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do it right at the mouth of the cave, or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just right off to the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need a counter for how many times she says "ja."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't want to give them the task, that's a fool's errand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is just making my miss my lederhosen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out my pocket kitchen sink and my air mattress and I take 60 seconds to set up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love how he always describes the magical process with such vivid detail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A brief moment of concentration and uttering of incantations before everyone surrounding Caleb, you're completely wrapped in a semi-transparent dome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it has a textured exterior, where it looks like a pile of snow against the side of the cavern from the outside. From the inside, it looks like a slightly shaded glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's warm on the inside. The freezing temperature is causing you to chatter your teeth and keep your legs and body muscles moving, suddenly becomes comfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: ♪ Rod of warmth, if anybody needs some help here ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but it takes a minute for your body to warm up.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I also want to cast Produce Flame and just pass it around, just to warm people up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reani comes around and warms each person individually with this roaring, crackling fire in the middle of the, yeah, exactly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've a little old bacon that I'll hold up and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I send out my kitty cat?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'm going to gently pet him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's getting there, she's getting there, yeah.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: A single tear rolls down my face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every actor needs a warmup process, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) Put your hand on her shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm casting Bless on Frumpkin, Caleb, and Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for one minute, I believe is the-- the length of time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He won't once he leaves the radius of Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to add a d4 to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's not a save or an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, just a straight roll plus Frumpkin's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Frumpkin's stats, did he give me Frumpkin's stats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, I got a Monster Manual right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cats. It's just a cat, fey cat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity bonus for stealth is plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So looking through Frumpkin's eyes, Frumpkin--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had nothing to do with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cat in snow is adorable, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the ice that is gathered around the edges and how it spindles out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I describe all of this to Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no light in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, Caleb always rolls shittily for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has disadvantage, because it is dark inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just hear (growling) and Frumpkin turns around to run as a big, furry hand grabs Frumpkin and Frumpkin just warps out of its hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did it see before it bamfed the fuck out? Big furry hand?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, was it? You said it was furry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looked like a humanoid hand, but with a bunch of fur on the back of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got to be a yeti, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would a yeti be living in there with the dragon?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Question, can we kill a yeti?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what a yeti--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a desire to kill a yeti in particular?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I send a message to the yeti?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think, can they speak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because Frumpkin began to turn around after hearing the sound and just, the hand reached out, grabbed, and as soon as it did, you bamfed it out, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One dragon is one thing. Dragon and several other occupants is entirely another matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the dragon has a yeti for a butler.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have to go in, we have to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to get super drunk and go in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can invisible myself and probably sneak past--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you invisible somebody who's not drunk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you go invisible and not be shit-faced?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you only make yourself invisible?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can only make myself invisible.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: What if I send in an animal that can see in the dark, like a bat, and then we can see what it is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you see through that animal's eyes?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: No, but it can come back and then I can talk to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make someone else invisible.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: What if it's upstairs on the ceiling? Then they can't see it, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A bat is, you know, they would just go in the cave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, let's go for it, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there such a thing as a snow bat?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I don't know, but I think bats are pretty strong, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to convince my dad to give me one, I wanted a pet bat, and he wouldn't let me.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: You read lots of books so I trust you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You you wanted a pet bat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this was after I asked for the snake.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Do you happen to have bat stats?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also have them right here.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I forgot to put it in my extras because I didn't think that I would need a bat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Armor class of 12, one hit point, speed of 30 feet flying, but they do have blindsight 60 feet, so they can sense things without light within 60 feet of them.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Does anybody have any other suggestions of an animal that should go in and look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, actually your idea is great. It's very low risk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems like it would fit right in.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Cool, I would like to cast--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you see through the bat's eyes?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: With Conjure Woodland Beings, I don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bat comes back out and she talks to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not, no, you just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you summoning a bat or a swarm of bats?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: That's the only level I can cast it at. (coos)

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to summon-- what's the challenge rating?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Can I summon eight bats, please?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I would like to summon eight bats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they obey what you say and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All these bats skitter and land inside the dome, where it's warm--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get out of the fucking dome! (yelling)

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: No, they're friends, they're friends! Then I would like to cast Speak With Animals.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I would like to say: Hello, friends, we have a special mission for you, I would like you to go into the cave, be quiet, really quiet, and I want you to see what's in there and then come back and then tell me, pretty please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So all eight bats look at each other and back at you and go, "Okay! "Okay!" "Okay!" "Okay!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch them emerge, and the wind hits and they all have to like, bear down before, but they make their way around and they all enter the cavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big-ass roc comes up, picks them out of the sky. Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No no no, I don't want a roc, I don't want a roc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (squeaking) A bunch of these bats return and land inside, landing on your arms and shoulders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so yeah, the bats express to you, with their rudimentary intelligence, to the best of their ability, that, "There's a room with, like, a cave across it."

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Then I go: Thank you, darlings! And I un-summon them.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: They said that there is a room with another room, the rooms have tents and fuzzy people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They didn't saw how many fuzzy people, did they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the yetis live in tents?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Or on the downside, no dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's on the downside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They said that there was another cave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So there could be a further cave beyond this that the dragon is in.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Is that what they communicated to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems the best you can ascertain. They're bats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might have to surpass this one first before we get to the gooey white dragon center.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless there's just a whole other cave on the other side of the mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or like higher up? How tall is the mountain? Are we looking at a cave really low on the mountain and there's like, a lot of mountain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: ♪ It's about as good as I expected ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, it's still a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you ascertain, by Essek's communication, that this teleportation spell was successful directly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To where we said to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're pretty sure this is Mythburrow, where you were looking for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just may have to go deeper in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or higher up, or down below.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least, I think we should explore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How wide is the mouth of the cave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How high on the mountain is the cave comparatively to the rest of the height of the mountain?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: If we make sure we sleep and we rest, I can turn into a giant hawk and I can go check out the mountain to see if there are other caves, if you want me to.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Should we go on an adventure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to do that now, before bed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can check out the higher up and see if there's a higher cave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some of us can stay here and a couple of people can do a scouting--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lots of wind, right? If the dragon happens to be out and about or whatever, then you're on your own, and in the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Message immediately if you see anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think I can message if I'm an eagle, but I can dive really fast back to the dome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you're going to use the buddy system, right?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Buddy system, we're going to stay together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There doesn't seem to be any safe way to do this, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: White eagles so that, you know, we'll blend in with the snow and stuff.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I think that's a good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're using your Wild Shape to become a white eagle and you're using--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a little more time than she does, but you have an hour before this spell fades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys make a perception check using the perception of a giant eagle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it is a giant eagle, they do, I believe, have advantage on sight, but because of the snow storm, your vision is halved, so it's just a straight roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 10-foot, five-foot, a lot of them appear to be just natural areas where either the rock just slightly recesses in, or the entrance of the caves themselves are meant to house smaller creatures or were areas where long ago, the volcanic activity that may have formed some of these mountains had created some sort of a hole, but nothing that seems to be large enough to allow the entry and exit of something as large as the white dragon you seek.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: So I guess after 40 minutes as an eagle, I shake my head and then point my head back down, like we should go back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've gone as high as the mountain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've gone pretty close to the peak, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and use my feathers and go: (laughter)

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Yeah, so I guess I'll make my way back to the hut.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big did it look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, they meander back and return to the edge of the cave where they came from.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were they just wandering? Were they wearing anything? Did they have tools or were they just wandering?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't see any tools on them necessarily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are more to the south.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No pouches with material or anything like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looks like the yetis wandered back to where they came from? Were they smelling the air?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Turn back into people so we can talk to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right as I land, I'm going to like, a foot off the ground turn into Jester.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Reani also does that, but not as gracefully and trips a little bit, like catches herself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really snowy and the mountain's very high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a couple little caves, but they're not big enough for a dragon, probably.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Unless it was a baby dragon, but I don't think it's a baby dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, oh my gosh, oh my gosh, I just had an idea.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Do we get to keep the baby dragon as a pet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what if the dragon went in when he was a baby, he was, you know, the Terror in Ivory, and then he grew and couldn't get back out, and that's why nobody has seen him for 100 years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't get out! He's stuck in there!

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: If we can get him out, then maybe like, he'll do things to us for a favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can just ride on him.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Oh my god, do you think he'd let us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's his nightmare, and he's stuck in this ivory mountain.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: See, he was nice the entire time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, you're on board with this idea, aren't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Definitely baby dragon stuck in frosty mountain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus has said nothing; it's not agreed upon--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just don't see the point of disagreeing with anything yet.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: See, Pinky's on our side, we win.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will speak when I think something has particular value. I think right now it's going to be an awful lot of seeing what comes at us, and a lot of the plans we're making right now I think are going to fall apart once we hit the giant furry, pale--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About nine to 10 feet tall, white fur, bluish-gray skin.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Have the Glassblades ever seen yetis and would we know about them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have probably encountered these entities once or twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've probably fought them off, or at least directed them away from individuals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are aware of the yetis, and as they describe them, you know exactly they're talking about.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: They're not nice, they attack townspeople, and I think it'd be best if they were eradicated.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are their weaknesses, do they have any? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They definitely do well with cold, and probably not the best means of assaulting them with anything cold-related.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Other than that, they're meat, and meat can be stabbed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Big question is should we assault these creatures tonight, before we bed down, or tomorrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's look a whole city of them or something.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: How many did you guys see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we get to sleep and be fully rested for the dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can draw them out with some noise, and then we can wait for them at the mouth of the cave, and when they come out, we ambush.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like they take their patrol fairly frequently. So yeah.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: What if we drew them out a few at a time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we able to ration our ability to attract them in that way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How hard were they to kill before?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: How hard were they to kill before, oh great DM?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're hearty, but not impossible by any means.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: But I took them down myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though you do know that they have pretty nasty claws.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I think with team work, we can take them out, but be sure not to get scratched.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to rest tonight either way before we do anything, right?.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, I don't want to fight all of them and use up all of our abilities and then be on empty when we fight the dragon.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Who is feeling up to fighting at least one fuzzy man?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: So we draw out one fuzzy man, we see how we feel, we take a nap, we fight a dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would love to have your enthusiasm, but two just came out and we did nothing.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: We draw out two fuzzy men, there are one, two, three, four, five--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five, six--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go like this, Mighty Nein!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There you go, you got it now.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: There's seven, and so seven versus two means we win.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We made this dome close to the entrance of the cave, so if there's a ruckus, I'm sure it will be loud.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: They can't see us in the dome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also don't have Caleb if we get into to this fight, because Caleb's got to stay in the dome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, and I am a little bit under-equipped at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I can fight, I can fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a whip and a dagger and a glove.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Fuzzy men are meat, we can fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it'd better if we cleared out some of this now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are two currently walking around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did they go back in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I take the handy dandy stone that you gave me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I toss it out in front of it, and then like, (growling), and that's the sound that it makes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then they come out, and we can tie a rope across the thing, and then as soon as they come out, they trip, and then they're prone, and then we attack them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the front of the cave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We stealthily pull a rope across--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, in the mouth of the cave.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: So I think we take out some fuzzy men now, so we don't have to take out more fuzzy men later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Caleb hang out the hut and throws fireballs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can throw spells outside of the dome, but from inside, nothing can come inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the dome, do we have line of sight on the mouth of the cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you guys made the dome on the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so we bring them towards the dome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the range on Fireball and the other--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's like 120 or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we just need to get them within sight of the dome.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: We take them 119 feet down the mountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spells and other magical effects can't extend through the dome or be cast through it, so no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he is stuck in there.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Through it or around it? Can he poke his head out and be like, "Pew pew?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say if he pokes his head out, the spell ends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, so no, he's sitting in that bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it because it's like his-- can he like, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Otherwise, the spell would be a little too powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's try to lure one or two.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Green man wants to try, yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Inspired-- yes actually, I would not--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can prep our spells, prep our attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are plotting the entranceway.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I think we're plotting a little, like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so what we're going to try to do is lure them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it'll help you strategize better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all we really wanted this entire time.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: We just wanted to see your maps, Matt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They just launched Plaguestone, a new line of sets tied to Pathfinder Second Edition-- Pathfinder Second Edition? Check it out now at Dwarvenforge.com.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are all situated over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, there's a fine powder all over it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, Matt, this is so cool.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: If I sneezed, would that make a mess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is actually fake snow from the hobby shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is one of the plateaus as it rises up further up this direction, but this is the entryway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have a laser anymore?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: How far away is that, is right here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each one of these is five feet, so from where you guys are here, it's about like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, just given the topography, if we could lure one to the edge--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! So you could be part of this fight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will be a part of this fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, let's station you somewhere hidden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the meantime, perhaps it's good to keep the hut up as a place of safety, if we need to retreat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Setting ourselves for the ambush, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or if someone is knocked unconscious, we can bring them somewhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so Caleb will be 149 feet away, and you'll have your fire powers ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will be-- I will be hidden as well, and I can fire upon them when they emerge from the cave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When they emerge, is there any way to get them to stick or to trip or to fall? Are we doing that trip wire plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we can try, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'd probably be hard to see-- Me, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (as Beau) Could attempt to stun them, which I will do regardless, but I'm assuming that they're pretty hearty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb does have a lot of silver wire. We can run it along, and then they can trip and fall off the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, from where he always makes his thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The silver thread is quite thin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we get them down over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is dumb, this is so dumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can lure them down here, then we just have some coverage, and we can do it, and it'll take them too long to get back to the cave--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The same on either side, so.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Would this planning session count as a brief short rest, since we're just sitting in the hut and we've just been sitting for a while?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I just wanted my Wild Shape back so bad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys want to take the hour here, yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, so what are we doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Caleb where you going to be?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (as Caleb) As far away as possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stay in the dome for now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you can just drop it as soon as he crosses, he needs to, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the meantime, it's a safe place to bring--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (as Beau) Okay, I dig it, I'm into it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will call for you when they--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where should I toss the stone to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To where it lures them like over here?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I think, yeah, because behind the rock, because then they're trapped behind the rock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will stay with Caleb also, just because someone needs to watch out for him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, are we going to tie it to a rope and then make it move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we trying to a rope?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because then we can start it over there and then we can reel it back in as they start to come out.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: So if we throw the stone in the front of the cave and then we reel it in, so they come to here, so they're backed up against this, and then we can attack them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll hit them with Bane and you guys can hit them with some other stuff.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can turn into a scorpion and poison then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good plan, that's a good plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're going to get one word out of this thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So technically, I could talk for like, four and a half minutes into it, drop it, and it would make a noise every 30 seconds.

lines.text: Oh, that's it, it's done, sorry Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now burning, the other one, the flames lick the front of its face and its chest, there's fire now across its shoulders and it's trying to pull back, but it's currently caught in the pincers of the scorpion, it's like (roaring).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what else to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action and your move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't get away since it's grappled, it's going to attempt to its attacks against you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it has disadvantage on them because it was hit by fire.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Does it punch itself in the face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first swing goes towards you and as it goes down, your claw actually grabs it and squeeze and you hear the wrist snap, it goes (grunting).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes that turn, Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just Sacred Flame this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and do damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 11 points of radiant flame damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just see where it's going already and I just start from the feet up and I'm just going to roll it all way up and just pull the whole furry thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The red burning fire atop meets the yellow-gold burning sacred fire from underneath, and as the two meet in the center, the entire yeti is immolated in the claws of the scorpion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Caleb have to make a saving throw so he doesn't--

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's only if he kills with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eyes on it, are more things coming? I'll take the rest of my movement to back up if they're still going to be coming in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At disadvantage, because it is in darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see nothing beyond probably 20 feet into the cavern where the light ends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb will take out his globules and send them down the cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as the light blobs--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the light globes drift inside the cavern, light up the perimeter, a moment, two moments, a few moments pass, and there are no yetis following up this band of which you have destroyed at the mouth of the cave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to sneak in here and maybe take our rest in their camp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it would be probably better.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Before we do that, I want to un-Wild Shape and turn around and go: See, it was easy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You became like a crazy monster.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Yeah, it's fun, I didn't get to poison them, though, but usually that's what I like do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know yetis, there's nothing to harvest off of them, right? Venomous fang or crazy claw, anything of worth?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: You burned most of them, so there's nothing to harvest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they might have some stuff back at their camp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both me and my duplicate walk up and high five you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go high five the duplicate and your hand just passes through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are entering the cavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealthily, everyone roll stealth checks, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, let me look, let me look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't I go ahead to the party, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all decided to enter, you don't get to decide not to because you rolled poorly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no, but I can go further into the cavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a wide 25-foot tunnel that presses further into the mountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm, to the left, western side of where you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go stealthily peek into one or two of those, if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check or a perception check, up to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When I say bones, I mean probably a good 300 pounds of bones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like whatever these things were devouring and eating to subsist, they just toss them into this back corner on the outskirts of where these tents were and then just built this graveyard of bones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also notice there are tents here for far more than four yetis, probably about nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amid the bones or the basic tools, anything shiny, any buckles or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, plenty of, like, leftover belts and a couple of brass buttons you might find from a coat that's torn, you grab a couple of those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Other than that, it's just the general tools and climbing equipment and what anyone would bring themselves up a mountain, essentially.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm going to walk through and do Detect Magic just to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks to be made from dirt, or you know, the colors, there are variations in color, so it could be, you know, dirt, urine, blood, all sorts of things that could've been used, but there are pieces of artwork and such put across the inside of the stretched leather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau will go check those out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a story from them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should probably clean up the bodies out front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really good at understanding art work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, come on, art history major.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see gifts and things brought from far away to this creature, and just at a quick glance at the different pieces of artwork, you can see there's almost like a microcosm religion or some sort of a relationship of worship to this dragon creature depicted in the artwork.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're on the right track, kiddos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want us to pretend to be yetis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but what if we cut out all of the guts from the yeti and put on the yeti suit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we could walk in like a yeti.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want a tauntaun in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can all be, like three of us could be in one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could walk in and like sit down--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't we also like, do the Polymorph thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, go back to the first idea.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I thought it was a good plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still like the first idea, because we can't all Polymorph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Polymorph only allows you to turn into beasts, if you remember.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're back to plan A.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think we're there at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that that's a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we looked for anything magical?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Will the dragon be mad we killed its friends?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It won't know yet, unless we tell it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like the dragon just looks at these guys as like a means to an end. I don't know, "friends" feels look a strong word for a dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worshipers is the vibe I'm getting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is something that you like to breathe on? What would a dragon just be like, (hissing) to? Something--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then it would eat it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but doesn't it, would it breathe with ice breath onto something it wanted to eat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you did read, and you did the pre-research on this, white dragons specifically enjoy freezing their prey through intense frost breath, and then eating them in their frozen state.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we like, put it on a goat or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and it'll freeze the goat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible to put it beneath some offering for the dragon and then either teleport it out or grab it away and leave the meat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we can use Mage Hand, and try to grab it away before the dragon does it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we brought multiple animals, can you make multiple animals?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can make a lot of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb can, or I can turn myself into a wooly mammoth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true, but what I'm saying is, if we presented as yetis, if we presented like say, four goats to the dragon, and the one in the back is the one that has our little piece of ingot in it, it's going to freeze all of them, maybe start munching on the first one, and when it gets to like number three, we just go get the last one and say, "Oh, didn't mean to give you this one, "sorry, dragon," and then leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do we have to steal the goat back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we need the thing that's inside it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, why don't we just take the thing that's inside and leave the goat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if it's in a pile, it doesn't have to be inside of it, it's just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe the goat has a really cool tag on its collar.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can talk to the goat to make it come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or it's a cow with a cowbell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never go wrong with a cowbell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we can send in a wooly mammoth, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and put a cowbell on it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And let it burn the wooly mammoth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then possibly, the wooly mammoth would be able to take it, because they're pretty strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even if not, you have the power to then, like, Dimension Door out of there and save yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, we're putting you up as bait?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'd be a wooly mammoth.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can conjure a wooly mammoth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we're both wooly mammoths?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Then it won't know what wooly mammoth to breathe on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And like, how much damage can the flame do, 100, 200 points of damage in one shot? 300? I mean, we'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's one kitten, I think we've established this, haven't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the minute that, you know, the form drops, as the wooly mammoth, then I just Dimension Door away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) I am not getting up on this yeti costume.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come with me to the hut.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dragons are a lot, though, I mean, I think we're--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we could have a hut to retreat to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This seems like, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You, me, and Fjord are in a yeti costume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're escorting two wooly mammoths up as tribute, the dragon freezes both wooly mammoths, one of them has our mithral on it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye on the door, in case other things are coming back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They'll be very angry because there's a bunch of dead yetis out there.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I hate to be a party, hmm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you using to conjure the mammoth?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I hate to be a party pooper, but I did counting, and there are lots of tents, and there are more tents than we killed, and if we're going to keep talking here, we should be prepared to fight or we should go outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will, as Caleb, will go to the front of the cave and he will take out his silver thread, and he will start doing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Set up an Alarm spell around there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hiding some of these bodies so that they're not just sitting out here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go out, because I'm really strong, and move the bodies and hide them under snow.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Will Conjure Flame burn yeti bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not going to turn to ash, you'd need a really hot flame for that.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Can I not, like, turn up the dial on my palm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't like, conjure a phosphorus grenade, in the middle of, with a cantrip.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I was hoping I could make like a torch, like a blue flame torch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From the simple weapons that Nott found, can I find a sword, just a simple sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there is actually a longsword amongst there, it looks like it's cold to the touch and hasn't been poorly treated, it's a little dinged on a couple edges, but it's still very serviceable and balanced.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that like a plus, or a plus eight versatile weapon? Or not a plus eight, but a d8?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I'm down on the ground dragging the yeti bodies into hiding, I miss Yasha a lot, because me and her were always the ones that carried heavy things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we send the cat in a little further to see what's inside? See if--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps put the dome up first before we do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb cast the Alarm spell at the mouth of the cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You chuck Frumpkin into which direction, to do what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll stealth for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus four. What's the cat's dex? 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, okay, and then roll a perception check with disadvantage, because there is no light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cat's scanning deeper in the cave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry, I don't know what's wrong with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin gets about 120 or so feet in, and has been able to really make out no details at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you bamf Frumpkin came back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I explain to them in an incredible Zemnian accent that's it's really fucking cold and about 120 feet of a journey, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I back from hiding the bodies yet or am I still hiding bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though there is still a mess of, you know, charred gore and stuff at the face of the cave you can try and cover with snow, and that'll take a little longer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so an hour and a half, I'd say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have it rest, we have to evade yetis who come in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to still formulate a plan for--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should offer it something and maybe just try and get what we need.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have anything to offer it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can make a small animal, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well how big, what's the biggest--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you make a cow, with a cowbell?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: How big is challenge rating two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a dragon, doesn't it like treasure?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Challenge rating two, like how big can I get?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Like if I'm conjuring a challenge rating two creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we have gold, we have platinum, we have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To talk to it, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a brown bear is challenge rating one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dire wolf is challenge rating one.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Oh! So challenge rating two would be like a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giant boar is a challenge rating two.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Do you think it would like to eat a boar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, do we want to try to buy it off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A giant elk is challenge rating two.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Or an elk, or something hoofed, or something fuzzy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, whatever you think would last the longest against ice. So what about a wintry type creature? Polar bear or some sort of--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: What about an ice spider queen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a thing that can resist some ice damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So and it can resist some ice damage.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: It's an ice queen, I would assume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. That seems like a plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, does it say that it has resistance on it?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Maybe the top? Resistant to cold, yes.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Do you think it wants to eat spiders?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything that comes into its lair, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a cape of steak, a steak cape.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the tent painting, what are they offering? What does it seem like-- what's on the altar if you're trying to work it out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because this is the kind of thing, this is what deducing is all about, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not a person who appreciates a lot of fine art.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, this yeti who drew this: not very talented.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's not on you, it's on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could call me over, I'm just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am good at looking at art.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are literally sitting next me saying this right now, I feel like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could call me over anytime you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you think about this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it's what I was thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's drawn with poop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe, well, we're going to take a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, okay, but if we take a nap here, there's good odds that the yetis are going to come back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have to wake up and fight them.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: They won't see us if we--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Stay at the side of the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll know that they're home and then we can take care of it once we wake up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Caleb, do you want to make a dome inside their tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're taking a long rest on the opposite wall within the yeti cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's made to look like rock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We want to be inside the cave for for when the tripwire goes off and lets them know that they are in the cave with us instead of outside of the cave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we do, but then we're in there with them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the can see us, can't they?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a big-ass dome where there wasn't one before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is something new in their living space that they've never seen before on the opposite side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to cast it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they can't get through the dome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but it's only eight hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then they can go poke the dragon and say, "Hey, there's some stuff in a dome."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the intelligence of a yeti, Reani? How smart?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do it one more time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go outside, we'll put our dome--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, before we go to sleep, I do have one thing I want to do if we're all--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, Liam has like eight things he wants to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course he does, what's he want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wants to change the Transmuter Stone to resistance to cold damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then he wants to cast Identify on all of those things that spilled out of the library book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the fucking, the two boxes and the bag or whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That came out of the page.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That came out of the page of the spell--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then Leomund's Tiny Hut for the dome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just giving him shit because I can.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: You're going to get like eight angry texts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a very detailed page, I got to give him credit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing you took that class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the things that fell out, the little box containers, one of them appears to be a snuff box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one looks to be a small, jangly container of coin, contains 25 platinum pieces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, he's going to be so happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The scroll case does contain three specific spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Wait, does that mean that he can learn those spells?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long does take for him to learn? Greater Invisibility, greater, something image, Major Image?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he would be like, "You don't know what my spells are." Sorry, Liam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If not, he would keep it under wraps until next game.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: We can Greater Invisibility all of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know though, but do you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So these are the things he might need to scribe down the road when he has some down time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The snuff box, nothing fancy about the snuff box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open it up and it's filled with some sort of ashy powder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already burned my Detect Magic for the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I might have Detect-- no wait, I have Dispel Magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He used Identify, he knows what it is, it's snuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, he did use Identify, he would have known.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fjord, if you've got a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You may be a gift for another god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said you were, you worshiped one god and then were gifted to another and then another?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let you speak to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But if you want, and it can be-- I know we have a lot here, and if you have any questions about what we're getting into, that's fine, but I wanted to give you the opportunity of maybe clarifying something that's inside of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, three questions, simple yes or no answers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have set up a small, little fire and I'm breathing in the incense and starting my trance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a reason that you intervened in my particular journey?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that that has that kind of answer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I were to change the way that I live, change what I focus on, or do, would you be able to help me regain some sort of standing in a way that's similar to what I knew before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The answer appears to be a definitive yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you please do something or show me something or intervene or take agency in my life and show me how best to move towards achieving that sort of change?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You understand the answer, as you are a man of faith, to know that the answer is to require faith.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's how it works. That's what a champion is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How often do you talk to her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even for my family, I'm a little...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Without all of that, is it still possible to talk to her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is the thing that inspires you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love the oceans. I always have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you like about the oceans?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps the greatest one on this plane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you dream about when your dreams are your own?

lines.text: We don't smell that-- it's going to take him a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know if that was an idle threat or just get into your mind, or if there is something to it, who knows? Dragons are weird.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can just imagine everybody take nap somewhere and a dragon shows up and goes "I found you!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those two weird machines, that was just a TiVo and a Netflix. I mean, like, he doesn't leave that cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's like the hoardiest of hoarder dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love how one of them was a TiVo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about a decade behind the times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of these pieces are from their Kickstarter last year, but they haven't shipped yet, so they were nice enough to send out a lot of these sample prototypes for use in this map--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So these sets will be available I think in a couple months, so thank you Nate and the whole team at Dwarven Forge for letting me play with this awesome ice set for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This die didn't roll too badly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick this up next Thursday. (laughs)

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: If I'm still alive by then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if we all survive until then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to heal everybody. It's all good.
